amendment.description: To permit reviews of criminal records of applicants for private security officer employment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3825 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3825 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10352-10353) To permit reviews of criminal records of applicants for private security officer employment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3825 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3825 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Levin.
